message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. Given its quality and features, I believe it's worth more than the standard market price. Would you be interested in acquiring this item? My initial offer is $120.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality of your product. I am willing to pay $100 for it.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your valuation and would like to meet in the middle. My counteroffer is $110 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the value we place on our creation.
